#summary Installation

= Introduction =

Detailed information on how to install the API.

= Details =

  # Install *ECLIPSE for RCP and RAP Developers*; Download from http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/; Unpack to /eclipse
  # Install *DataNucleus 2.1.0-Release* Plugins; Download from http://sourceforge.net/projects/datanucleus/files/datanucleus-accessplatform/; Copy JARS to ECLIPSE "dropins" folder
  # Install *JDO API 3.0*; Download from http://www.datanucleus.org/downloads/maven2/javax/jdo/jdo-api/; Copy JAR to ECLIPSE "dropins" folder
  # RUN Eclipse and *create Workspace*; Suggestion: Colibri
  # Install *SVN-Subclipse Plugin*; HELP - Install New Software; http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x
  # Install *BIRT Plugin*; HELP - Install New Software; Business Intelligence, Reporting and Charting
  # Install *DataNucleus Eclipse Plugin*; HELP - Install New Software; http://www.datanucleus.org/downloads/eclipse-update
  # Checkout all the projects on this repository; http://code.google.com/p/projectocolibri/; You should have NO errors (few warnings, though!)
  # Run colibri.rcp.api.example PRODUCT; This is an RCP project that uses the Colibri Plugin API
